column4: hey all, I'm trying to set up my hp2600 printer through  the network. When I go to the Add a printer thing it asks for a host and a port (default 9100) what on earth do I put in the host?
the IP of your network printer
How do I find the IP address?
where does your printer get its ip, dhcp or is static ?
DHCP I think (not entirely sure)
so you propably have it in your router that has dhcp ?
ok, now to remember the IP address and username and password of my router :\
you could try the comman nmap
to find out what services are running in your network
A what? :p
sudo apt-get install nmap
now what do I do with it?
and it should show one ip with port 9100 (if printer is on the same network)
hmm
did you find your computer an the router ?
didnt you have the printer on as you did the printer wizard ? i think it should find it automaticly
naa, it didnt find it. It was on earlier but the damn thing turns itself off if you dont use it for 10 minutes or somehting
nice
thanks for your help =)
thank you for you patience/interest :)
